text:
Knowing that this brand comes from Korea, and it never fail my expectations.

The shampoo containing Vegan-certified & Natural cooling ingredients. The fragrance is so soft that my dog do not need to rub it off after bathing.

Grooming series (from Korea)  : Shampoo has a light, and sweet scent. First try at a dry shampoo as my cat is really terrified of showers, and I think we found a solution to this! (Look at The cute little paw!)The cat mist moisturized her fur coat after showers.

Wet food (from Germany) : infused with catnip, and this draws macs to finish up her food. Though she might be slightly fussy about the tomato ingredient

Have been using the INOOM Cat Ear Cleaner for my kitten, Mandu (IG: mandu_the_cinnamon_cat) since February 2024. Love this loads as it contains natural herbs and does not have any harsh chemicals. As Mandu has folded ears, this makes it a breeze during his cleaning routine as the application is easy and fuss-free. We love the clean and fresh smell too!
Bath Wayne using Inoom bath shampoo. After 5th day n yet he still looks very fluffy. Love it. Will make introduces to my friends too.
